name: Mind Explode
description:
Hello! this is my first game made in godot as well as my first using non-visual programming. In the game, you wall jump around and throw explosives to clear a person's dreams from unwelcome "barriers and ideas". Two endings can be reached by either doing what you're told, or doing the complete opposite. sadly, these endings are currently placeholder text due to running out of time. 

tip:  jumping into explosives while they are in the air increases blast jump height

Credit:

SFX: Deadly Kombat Free,  FilmCrow Recorded SFX, zapsplat.com

Art , Music, Programming, Design - Me
